name: Bee.js | Ajax framework
tagline: Bee.js is frontend javascript's framework which made to help developers to create the better websites. ajax is the concentration point on this project
body:
### Welcome to Bee.js Pages.
long story short.
ajax is a big part of every project these days.
every framework handle the ajax in deferent way, but non of em focused on ajax completely.
all frameworks just handle a little part of ajax and in most of the time, every usability, needs deferent library.
for example dealing with uploading files, restful, Bigpipe and loading JS and CSS files and etc.

### How to use
using this framework is easy.
just need to put this code in head's tag of your project and then our lovely bee can start making honey into the honeycomb.
```html
<script src="javascript/bee.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
```
after loading bee framework is usable by calling from ` bee ` variable.

### Modules
There are many modules which you can use by calling it by ` wizz() ` method.
also for those who are a little old fashion, we provided some alternation such as:

* bee.start(module);
* bee.load(module);
 
```html
<script type="text/javascript">
   bee.wizz(module);
</script>
```

**honeycomb**
honeycomb is a module that handle the ajax requests.
honeycomb has some chain methods which you can make a query with those and then execute it by calling `spread()` method.
```javascript
bee.wizz('honeycomb')
   .request('http://domain.com/index.html')
   .method('get')
   .on('success', function (result) {
      // result 
      console.log('success', result);
    })
   .resultData('text')
   .spread();
```
